title: A  VERY NICE STUDENT STUDIO AT ARC DE TRIOMPHE ETOILE
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


A  VERY NICE STUDENT STUDIO AT ARC DE TRIOMPHE ETOILE

In a very good securit buildingstone monuments historique, a very nice student studio with  a very nice confortable armchair which becomes a confortable bed, a shower room (no bathroom) and a kitchenett with two fires and refrigerator.and microwave .

If you are a student, and you come to Paris for STUDYING, or for a stage, or some months for working, please write. 

If you come and visit Paris for sometimes, don t hesitate to write. 

Please send your direct adress mail and 1100 € all fees included .electricity heating 
And fees building it ll be like a seasonal contract .

Pictures in demand please 
whattsap33 620994112.
